plugin.name: GUI
plugin.description: The GUI configuration plugin extends the configuration of graphical user interfaces to various options to adjust the look and feel.

group.name: groups
group.description: Configures the target messaging groups for various object types. These parameters should only be touched if you know what you are doing.

parameter.name: pick
parameter.description: Defines the target messaging group for manual picks, e.g. made in scolv.

parameter.name: amplitude
parameter.description: Defines the target messaging group for amplitudes, e.g. computed in scolv.

parameter.name: magnitude
parameter.description: Defines the target messaging group for magnitudes. scolv does not use this group but sends magnitudes together with the origin to the origin group.

parameter.name: location
parameter.description: Defines the target messaging group for origins created in e.g. scolv.

parameter.name: focalMechanism
parameter.description: Defines the target messaging group for focal mechanisms created in e.g. scolv.

parameter.name: event
parameter.description: Defines the target messaging group for events and event journal entries.

parameter.name: location
parameter.description: Specified the location and the structure of the map tiles to be used. This path is composed of zero or more directives and must include at least one conversion specification which starts with is introduced by the character % followed by a conversion specifier. Valid specifiers are s (replaced by tile ID), l (tile level), c (tile column) and r (tile row). An example for using the OpenStreetMap file structure is /path/to/maps/%l/%c/%r.png.

parameter.name: format
parameter.description: Projection of the map tiles. Supported formats are: rectangular and mercator.

parameter.name: cacheSize
parameter.description: Cache size of the map tiles. If 0 is specified a default cache size of 32mb is used. The higher the cache size the better the performance in higher resolutions. A higher cache size causes less image loader calls but requires more client memory.

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Used to distinguish tile store implementations provided by plug-ins.

parameter.name: customLayers
parameter.description: Allows to add custom layers that are included via plugins. This is a list of layer names. A plugin must implement the layer interface and register itself with the name used in this list. The order of layers is the default order. The custom layers are prepended to the maps defaults layers such as the grid and the cities.

parameter.name: layers
parameter.description: Defines the order of all configured layers. This includes the standard layers (grid, cities) as well as custom layers. The name of the grid layer is "grid" and the name of the cities layer is "cities".

group.name: events
group.description: Configuration options for the events layer that shows all events on the map that are loaded in the event list.

parameter.name: topPopulatedPlaces
parameter.description: Maximum number of cities to be rendered. If cityPopulationWeight is less or equal than 0 then all cities are rendered ordered by population count, highest first. To show the N most populated places in the visible map region, set "scheme.map.cityPopulationWeight" to 0 and set this parameter to N.

parameter.name: sensitivity
parameter.description: Zoom sensitivity of the map

group.name: scheme
group.description: This group defines various color and font options for SeisComp3 graphical user interfaces. There are various conventions to define colors, fonts and gradients. A color is defined in HTML convention. If rgb or rgba is used it must be quoted because the comma is handled as list separator by the configuration. Gradients are configured as lists of tuples where each tuple is colon separated in the form value:color. Color is again a color definition and value is either int or double.

parameter.name: showMenu
parameter.description: Show menu bar.

parameter.name: showStatusBar
parameter.description: Show status bar.

parameter.name: tabPosition
parameter.description: Set position if tab bar. An unset value lets the application decide where to place the tab bar. This option might not be supported by all applications. Valid positions are: off, north, south, east, west

parameter.name: background
parameter.description: A general application background color. Can be used to give each application a different background color. An unset value lets Qt decide.

parameter.name: foreground
parameter.description: The general color of records/traces.

parameter.name: alternateForeground
parameter.description: A general trace color of the alternate trace (eg scheli).

parameter.name: background
parameter.description: The general background color of records/traces.

parameter.name: alternateBackground
parameter.description: A general background color of the alternate trace.

parameter.name: spectrogram
parameter.description: The trace color used on top of a spectrogram.

parameter.name: gaps
parameter.description: The color of data gaps in trace views.

parameter.name: overlaps
parameter.description: The color of data overlaps in trace views.

parameter.name: alignment
parameter.description: The color of the alignment marker in trace views.

group.name: offset
group.description: Defines the pen of the record offset line.

parameter.name: color
parameter.description: The color of the pen.

parameter.name: style
parameter.description: The style of the pen. Supported values are: NoPen, SolidLine, DashLine, DotLine, DashDotLine, DashDotDotLine.

parameter.name: width
parameter.description: The width of the pen.

group.name: gridPen
group.description: Defines the pen of the record grid.

parameter.name: color
parameter.description: The color of the pen.

parameter.name: style
parameter.description: The style of the pen. Supported values are: NoPen, SolidLine, DashLine, DotLine, DashDotLine, DashDotDotLine.

parameter.name: width
parameter.description: The width of the pen.

group.name: states
group.description: Defines the background color of records depending on their state.

parameter.name: unrequested
parameter.description: Additional data which was not requested.

parameter.name: requested
parameter.description: Requested data Background color of requested data.

parameter.name: inProgress
parameter.description: Data currently loading.

parameter.name: notAvailable
parameter.description: Data which was requested but is not available.

parameter.name: manual
parameter.description: The color of manual picks.

parameter.name: automatic
parameter.description: The color of automatic picks.

parameter.name: undefined
parameter.description: The color of picks with undefined state.

parameter.name: disabled
parameter.description: The color of disabled picks.

parameter.name: manual
parameter.description: The color of manual arrivals (arrivals that bind manual picks, e.g. residual plot of scolv, manual picker, ...)

parameter.name: automatic
parameter.description: The color of automatic arrivals,

parameter.name: theoretical
parameter.description: The color of theoretical arrivals.

parameter.name: undefined
parameter.description: The color of arrivals binding picks with undefined state.

parameter.name: disabled
parameter.description: The color of disabled arrivals.

parameter.name: residuals
parameter.description: The gradient of arrivals residuals. A gradient is defined as a list of tuples separated by colon where the first item is the value and the second is the color. Colors can be given in rgb notation or hex. when rgb is used double quotes are needed to protect the comma inside the rgb definition, e.g. -8:"rgb(0,0,100)", -4:"rgb(0,0,255)", -3:"rgb(100,100,255)", ...

parameter.name: set
parameter.description: The color of active magnitudes.

parameter.name: unset
parameter.description: The color of inactive magnitudes.

parameter.name: disabled
parameter.description: The color of disabled magnitudes.

parameter.name: residuals
parameter.description: The gradient of magnitude residuals.

parameter.name: text
parameter.description: The color of the station name.

parameter.name: associated
parameter.description: The color of associated stations (e.g. in scmv).

parameter.name: triggering
parameter.description: The color of triggered stations.

parameter.name: disabled
parameter.description: The color of disabled stations.

parameter.name: idle
parameter.description: The color of idle stations.

group.name: qc
group.description: The color of QC.delay thresholds in scmv.

group.name: gm
group.description: The color of ground motion amplitudes in scmv.

parameter.name: selectedTraceZoom
parameter.description: The color of the selected zoom area (e.g. manual picker).

parameter.name: lines
parameter.description: The color of lines in the map (e.g. lines connecting the origin and a station).

parameter.name: outlines
parameter.description: The color of station outlines in the map.

group.name: grid
group.description: Defines the pen of the latitude/longitude grid of the map.

parameter.name: color
parameter.description: The color of the pen.

parameter.name: style
parameter.description: The style of the pen. Supported values are: NoPen, SolidLine, DashLine, DotLine, DashDotLine, DashDotDotLine.

parameter.name: width
parameter.description: The width of the pen.

parameter.name: stationAnnotations
parameter.description: The color of station annotations.

parameter.name: cityLabels
parameter.description: The color of city labels.

parameter.name: cityOutlines
parameter.description: The color of city outlines.

parameter.name: cityCapital
parameter.description: The color of a capital.

parameter.name: cityNormal
parameter.description: The color of a "normal" city.

parameter.name: background
parameter.description: The map legend background color.

parameter.name: border
parameter.description: The map legend border color.

parameter.name: text
parameter.description: The map legend text color.

parameter.name: headerText
parameter.description: The map legend header color.

parameter.name: gradient
parameter.description: The depth gradient.

parameter.name: discrete
parameter.description: Setting this parameter to true will not interpolate between the depth steps and the color for a depth <= input is used.

group.name: originStatus
group.description: The origin status colors (e.g. in event list).

group.name: splash
group.description: Defines colors used in the splash screen shown at application startup.

parameter.name: message
parameter.description: Text color of the message string.

parameter.name: version
parameter.description: Text color of the version string.

parameter.name: lineWidth
parameter.description: The line width of the marker (e.g. picks of manual picker).

parameter.name: lineWidth
parameter.description: The line width of the records / traces.

parameter.name: antiAliasing
parameter.description: Configures antialiasing of records / traces. Antialiasing needs more two times to storage space as non antialiasing but it improves visual quality.

parameter.name: optimize
parameter.description: Configures optimization of trace polylines. If activated then lines on the same pixel line or same pixel row collapse into single lines.

group.name: base
group.description: The general base font of an application. This overrides the default Qt4 application font.

parameter.name: family
parameter.description: Sets the family name of the font. The name is case insensitive and may include a foundry name.

parameter.name: size
parameter.description: Defines the point size of the font

group.name: small
group.description: The smallest available font. If undefined the point size is 2 points smaller than the base font.

parameter.name: family
parameter.description: Sets the family name of the font. The name is case insensitive and may include a foundry name.

parameter.name: size
parameter.description: Defines the point size of the font

group.name: normal
group.description: The default text font. If undefined the point size is 2 points larger than the base font.

parameter.name: family
parameter.description: Sets the family name of the font. The name is case insensitive and may include a foundry name.

parameter.name: size
parameter.description: Defines the point size of the font

group.name: large
group.description: The largest text font. If undefined the point size is 6 points larger than the base font.

parameter.name: family
parameter.description: Sets the family name of the font. The name is case insensitive and may include a foundry name.

parameter.name: size
parameter.description: Defines the point size of the font

group.name: highlight
group.description: Font used to highlight text. If undefined it equals the normal font except for a bold font face.

parameter.name: family
parameter.description: Sets the family name of the font. The name is case insensitive and may include a foundry name.

parameter.name: size
parameter.description: Defines the point size of the font

group.name: heading1
group.description: The largest heading font. If undefined it uses a bold font face and a font size twice as large as the normal font.

parameter.name: family
parameter.description: Sets the family name of the font. The name is case insensitive and may include a foundry name.

parameter.name: size
parameter.description: Defines the point size of the font

group.name: heading2
group.description: The second largest heading font. If undefined it uses a bold font face and a font size twice as large as the base font.

parameter.name: family
parameter.description: Sets the family name of the font. The name is case insensitive and may include a foundry name.

parameter.name: size
parameter.description: Defines the point size of the font

group.name: heading3
group.description: The smallest heading font. If undefined it uses a bold font face and a font size 4 points larger than the base font.

parameter.name: family
parameter.description: Sets the family name of the font. The name is case insensitive and may include a foundry name.

parameter.name: size
parameter.description: Defines the point size of the font

group.name: cityLabels
group.description: Font used for city labels. If undefined it equals the base font.

parameter.name: family
parameter.description: Sets the family name of the font. The name is case insensitive and may include a foundry name.

parameter.name: size
parameter.description: Defines the point size of the font

group.name: splashVersion
group.description: Font used for version string in the splash dialog shown at application startup. If undefined it equals the base font with a bold font face and a font size of 12.

parameter.name: family
parameter.description: Sets the family name of the font. The name is case insensitive and may include a foundry name.

parameter.name: size
parameter.description: Defines the point size of the font

group.name: splashMessage
group.description: Font used for the message text in the splash dialog shown at application startup. If undefined it equals the base font with a font size of 12.

parameter.name: family
parameter.description: Sets the family name of the font. The name is case insensitive and may include a foundry name.

parameter.name: size
parameter.description: Defines the point size of the font

parameter.name: stationSize
parameter.description: The station symbol size (e.g. in scmv).

parameter.name: originSymbolMinSize
parameter.description: The origin symbol minimum size. The formula to compute the size of the origin symbol is: 4.9*(M-1.2).

parameter.name: vectorLayerAntiAlias
parameter.description: Should the vector layer in the map use antialiasing? This improves the visual quality but decreases performance.

parameter.name: bilinearFilter
parameter.description: Should the map use a bilinear filter? The bilinear filter improves the visual quality but decreases performance slightly. It is only used for static map images. Not while dragging.

parameter.name: showGrid
parameter.description: Should the map display the grid?

parameter.name: showCities
parameter.description: Should the map display the cities?

parameter.name: cityPopulationWeight
parameter.description: Controls at which zoom level a city will be visible. The following formula is used: screen_width (km) * weight >= population

parameter.name: showLayers
parameter.description: Should the map display the custom layers?

parameter.name: showLegends
parameter.description: Show map legends initially. Some applications provide controls to toggle the visibility in addition to this option.

parameter.name: projection
parameter.description: SeisComP ships with the rectangular projection built-in. Other projections may be provided through plugins.

parameter.name: toBGR
parameter.description: Converts map colors from RGB color scheme to BGR.

parameter.name: polygonRoughness
parameter.description: Minimum screen distance to plot a polygon or polyline line segment.

parameter.name: depth
parameter.description: The precision of depth values.

parameter.name: distance
parameter.description: The precision of distance values.

parameter.name: location
parameter.description: The precision of lat/lon values.

parameter.name: pickTime
parameter.description: The precision of pick times.

parameter.name: traceValues
parameter.description: Precision of displayed offset/amp in all trace widgets.

parameter.name: rms
parameter.description: Precision of RMS values.

parameter.name: uncertainties
parameter.description: Precision of uncertainty values, e.g. latitude errors.

parameter.name: distanceInKM
parameter.description: Display distances in km?

parameter.name: useLocalTime
parameter.description: Display times in localtime or UTC (default).

group.name: splash
group.description: Defines the appearance of the splash screen shown at application startup.

group.name: message
group.description: Position of the message text.

parameter.name: align
parameter.description: Qt::Alignment bit mask. Default: AlignHCenter | AlignBottom

group.name: pos
group.description: Position in screen coordinates.

parameter.name: x
parameter.description: Horizontal position.

parameter.name: y
parameter.description: Vertical position.

group.name: version
group.description: Position of the version string

parameter.name: align
parameter.description: Qt::Alignment bit mask. Default: AlignRight | AlignBottom

group.name: pos
group.description: Position in screen coordinates.

parameter.name: x
parameter.description: Horizontal position.

parameter.name: y
parameter.description: Vertical position.

group.name: timeAgo
group.description: Defines maximum age of events to load. The value of all parameters are aggregated.

parameter.name: days
parameter.description: Age in days.

parameter.name: hours
parameter.description: Age in hours.

parameter.name: minutes
parameter.description: Age in minutes.

parameter.name: seconds
parameter.description: Age in seconds.

group.name: mode
group.description: Configuration of special applications modes.

parameter.name: interactive
parameter.description: Defines if application interaction is allowed.

parameter.name: fullscreen
parameter.description: Defines if the application should be launched in fullscreen mode hiding title bar, main menu and status bar.

parameter.name: filters
parameter.default: "BP 0.1 - 1 Hz 3rd order;BW(3,0.1,1)","BP 0.1 - 2 Hz 3rd order;BW(3,0.1,2)","BP 0.4 - 1 Hz 3rd order;BW(3,0.4,1)","@BP 0.7 - 2 Hz 3rd order;BW(3,0.7,2)""BP 1 - 3 Hz 3rd order;BW(3,1.0,3)","BP 2 - 4 Hz 3rd order;BW(3,2.0,4)","BP 3 - 6 Hz 3rd order;BW(3,3.0,6)","BP 4 - 8 Hz 3rd order;BW(3,4.0,8)","BP 1 - 5 Hz 3rd order;BW(3,1.0,5)","BP 0.7 - 2 Hz + STA/LTA(1,50);RMHP(10)->ITAPER(30)->BW(3,0.7,2)->STALTA(1,50)"
parameter.description: Configures the default filters selectable in manual picker. The entry with a leading "@" is selected as default filter.

parameter.name: visibleColumns
parameter.default: M, TP, Phases, Lat, Lon, Depth, Stat, Agency, Region, ID
parameter.description: Configure the columns of the event list that are visible initially. The first column containing the origin time is always visible and cannot be hidden. Possible values are: Type, M, TP, Phases, Lat, Lon, Depth, Stat, FM, Agency, Region, ID.

parameter.name: regions
parameter.description: Configured a list of regions that can be used as filter of the result set.

parameter.name: customColumn
parameter.description: Name of an additional custom column which displays the value of certain origin and event comments.

parameter.name: originCommentID
parameter.description: ID of the origin comment to look up.

parameter.name: eventCommentID
parameter.description: ID of the event comment to look up.

parameter.name: pos
parameter.description: Position of the column. If the configured position is less than 0 or if it exceeds the total number of columns then the column is appended to the right.

parameter.name: default
parameter.description: Default value to display if the specified origin or event comment id was not found.

parameter.name: colors
parameter.description: Mapping of comment values to colors used as text color. E.g. "foo:#000,bar:red".

struct.description: Defines a rectangular region that can be used as a result set filter on client side.

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Defines the name of the region that shows up in the listbox.

parameter.name: rect
parameter.description: Defines a rectangular region with a list of 4 values: latmin, lonmin, latmax, lonmax.

parameter.name: label
parameter.description: Defines the text of the option "Show only own events".

parameter.name: whitelist
parameter.description: Sets a list of preferred agencies. Events from preferred agencies are defined as "own" events.

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Sets the type of the filter. If type is "events" the agency of the preferred origin of the event is checked. If type is "origins" the agency of all origins of an event is checked and if at least one origins agency is part of the whitelist it will pass the filter. Or in other words, the event is hidden if no origin is from a preferred agency.

parameter.name: enabled
parameter.description: Sets the default state of the "Show only own events" option.

parameter.name: label
parameter.description: Defines the text of the option "Hide other/fake events".

parameter.name: blacklist
parameter.description: List of event type to be hidden if the "Hide other/fake events" option is ticked.

parameter.name: enabled
parameter.description: Sets the default state of the "Hide other/fake events" option.

parameter.name: enabled
parameter.description: Sets the default state of the "Hide events outside" option.

group.name: database
group.description: Pre-set options to filter an event list request.

parameter.name: columns
parameter.description: Registration of custom event list columns.

group.name: column
group.description: Definition of custom event list column whose values are filled by external scripts.

parameter.name: script
parameter.description: External script to invoke for each event list entry. The object represented by the list entry is serialized to XML and passed to the script on stdin. If the return code of the script is 0 ('success') then the script result is read from stdout and displayed in the corresponding event list cell.

parameter.name: pos
parameter.description: Position of the column. If the configured position is less than 0 or if it exceeds the total number of columns then the column is appended to the right.

parameter.name: label
parameter.description: Column name shown in header of event list table.

parameter.name: types
parameter.description: Object types this script should be invoked for. Supported values are 'Event' and 'Origin'.

group.name: eventsummary
group.description: Parameters controlling the event summary view used e.g. in scolv.

parameter.name: commentId
parameter.description: Set an alert for every event comment that ID matches the specified regular expression, e.g. "alert_.*".

parameter.name: commentBlacklist
parameter.description: List of comments to ignore, e.g. "nil".

parameter.name: alertGradient
parameter.description: Discrete mapping of time values in seconds to colors used as text color in case of an active alert. E.g. "0:00FF00,900:FF0000".

parameter.name: textSize
parameter.description: The text size of the time ago label in case of an active alert.
